properties.name: Everest Base Camp
properties.description: Trek to the foot of the world's highest peak through Sherpa villages and glaciers

properties.name: Kala Patthar Viewpoint
properties.description: 5,500m viewpoint offering the most stunning panorama of Mount Everest

properties.name: Annapurna Base Camp
properties.description: Himalayan amphitheater surrounded by 8,000m peaks and rhododendron forests

properties.name: Poon Hill Sunrise
properties.description: Classic Himalayan sunrise viewpoint with 360-degree mountain panoramas

properties.name: Kathmandu Durbar Square
properties.description: Ancient royal square with ornate temples, palaces, and living goddess Kumari
